title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 19, 2021
description: "I have always written what I wanted to write. I have never considered the audience for one second. … Before publication, I am a despot."—Philip Pullman (1946)
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "I have always written what I wanted to write. I have never considered the audience for one second. … Before publication, I am a despot."—Philip Pullman (1946)
